title: Blazor .NetCore hosted problems with launchsettings
body:
I created a default Blazor Webassembly app with checked Progressive Web App and ASP.NET Core hosted.
Then I changed the applicationUrl in both launchsettings.json files (server and client).

"applicationUrl": "https://0.0.0.0:5001;http://0.0.0.0:5000",
 I can open the browser with my local address (192.168.1.5:5000 calls the App).

After changing the launchsettings.json on either Server or Client app I can't get the "install" button for the progressive webapp anymore in my browser. Also Visual Studio won't open the browser automatically anymore to open up the browser with the address.

Any clues? Is that a bug?

When I change the startup url in the project settings -> Debug it also won't open the browser.

There are no exceptions or logs in the output or console.

I just want the app to be available in my private network for a proof of concept if I can install it as PWA on my phone and so on.

Thanks in advance
